trustfund:
TF091054-STRENGTHENING EMERGENCY HEALTH
            RESPONSE IN NORTHERN IRAQ,TF092237-IRTF - IRAQ REGIONAL HEALTH
            EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Regional Health Emergency Response Project is to assist the
            Kurdistan regional government to build capacity in the
            establishment of rapid, coordinated and effective response
            services to health emergencies, including those resulting
            from acts of violence, accidents, or natural disasters. This
            is a level two restructuring for a six-month extension of
            the project, which has a current closing date of December
            31, 2011 and therefore it is to extend the closing date to
            June 30, 2012. This will be the second extension of the
            project. The extension has been assessed to be needed to
            complete all remaining project activities, by which the
            project objectives will be met within the requested
            six-month period.
